column1: The Corporate Tax team is a function within the Penang Finance Shared Service which supports all business and financial operations within the Asia Pacific (APAC) Region. The team works very closely with the US Corporate Tax team.

• Responsible to prepare schedules in relations to Corporate Income Tax Compliance tasks (US/Local Tax reporting) from reporting to payment submission
  • Responsible to handle indirect tax matters (i.e. VAT/Withholding tax)
  • Support on monthly closing activities and identify and drive process improvements to align regional processes
  • Be the first point of contact for the supporting country for end to end corporate income tax compliance activities – Liaise with tax consultant and tax authority as and when required
  • Support the internal teams by performing tax related analysis of the operating and business performance for the countries.
  • Identify and highlighting any potential risks and issues from Income Tax Compliance perspective.
  • Responsible for timely monthly Balance Sheet Reconciliation by ensuring documentation are in compliance with Motorola Solutions’ Accounting Policies and procedures
  • Assist in establishing strong internal operational environment through process improvements and projects.
  • Any other tax ad-hoc duties.

• Bachelor Degree in Finance and Accounting with at least 1 year of relevant tax experience from Big 4 Firm (preferable). Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
  • Strong knowledge in Corporate Income Tax
  • Prefer to have good working knowledge in Excel
  • Good written and verbal communication skills in English and Chinese.

  • Strong analytical

column1:
Job context

To provide support and assistance for the Data Privacy function within Group Risk & Compliance:-

  • Operationalise
column2:
enforce and implement data protection policies at the Group level and Operating Companies (“Opcos”);
  • Support execution of privacy risk assessments and suggest prioritization of privacy risk treatment;
  • Strategise and monitor the Privacy program and activities at the Group level and Opcos;
  • Devise and update policies and procedures for data breach incident responses
column3:
ensuring alignment with the actual implementation of personal data processing activities;
  • Ensure compliance to applicable legislations and best practices;
  • In crafting privacy training and awareness programs and set up a personal data breach response plan; and
  • Support in preparing Privacy papers for the Group BRCC and the Board.

column1:
Scope & authority

  • Support the Group Data Privacy Officer (“GDPO”) and Privacy Manager on Privacy activities across the Axiata Group;
  • Review and update compliance status of the Privacy programs (including but not limited to KPIs) and compile the progress report for monthly and quarterly management updates;
  • Ensure OpCos’ compliance to the Privacy programs (including but not limited to KPIs) and manage the evidence of compliance with OpCos;
  • Maintain the maturity level compliance at OpCos and liaise with the OpCos working team on any action items;
  • Assist the Privacy Manager and Axiata CC team on improving the Privacy maturity and compliance;
  • Review and update training and awareness content for the Axiata Group’s mandatory Privacy training modules.
  • Conduct research and provide support pertaining to Data Privacy

Key Success factors

  • Good time management and able to work under tight timelines.
  • Excellent communications in English: written and spoken.
  • Meticulous and detail-oriented.
  • Good data analytics skill.

column1: Responsible to assist Level 1 support in solving a more complex technical incident/requests/change by investigating elevated tickets by confirming the validity of the problem and seeking known solutions

Communicate with customer to learn more specific details about the incident/request and work through different troubleshooting techniques. Escalate the incident/requests to Level 3 (vendor) if the solution needs programming fix of the application.

Act as liaison between the product development team and the support team during design to identify and review technical requirements to enable new modules to be integrated with the existing application.

Investigate and work with developers and other technical resources to resolve issues

Job Description:

  • Responsible to assist Level 1 support in solving a more complex technical incident/requests/change by investigating elevated tickets by confirming the validity of the problem and seeking known solutions
  • Communicate with customer to learn more specific details about the incident/request and work through different troubleshooting techniques. Escalate the incident/requests to Level 3 (vendor) if the solution needs programming fix of the application.
  • Act as liaison between the product development team and the support team during design to identify and review technical requirements to enable new modules to be integrated with the existing application.
  • Generate reports and/or data extracts to support business analysis.
  • Communicate and interpret requirements to the development team
  • Assist integration middleware in the Development & Integration environment.
  • Familiarity with database tools such as SQL Developer; Integration Architecture
column2:
and best practices
  • Document configuration and workarounds etc. for deployment to further environments
  • Work with the Test / QA Analyst to support integration testing
  • Investigate and work with developers and other technical resources to resolve issues
  • Establish standardized processes and procedures for integration where feasible

column1:
Job Requirements:

  • Level 2 support personnel to have a deep understanding of the business applications and extensive experience in troubleshooting
  • Knowledge of application services architecture and integration technologies including web services and message queuing (for example RESTFul web services
column2:
MQSeries etc.)
  • Good knowledge of JSON and XML data formats.
  • Java programming knowledge will be a plus

Looking for developers who are keen and passionate to explore a career in development on BMC Helix ITSM platform. You will be responsible in development and configuring activities on BMC platform to meet our internal ITSM and our customer ITSM needs.

Job Responsibilities

· Development

o Facilitate business and technical requirements sessions with Business Users
o Demonstrate BMC Remedy solutions to Business Users.
o Design product-based or custom solutions based on BMC Helix ITSM (Remedy) Best Practice.
o Estimate level of effort to design or deploy products or solutions

o Implement integrations with BMC ITSM applications.

· Support

o Provide L2/L3 support whenever necessary.
o Will act as SME on BMC Helix ITSM and responsible to respond on business requests for product or solution information.

Maintenance

o Work directly with BMC to renew license and creating defect.
o Perform day to day application configuration (adding categories
o Perform maintenance such as performance tuning
· Basic understanding on ITSM tools like BMC Helix
· Highly motivated and resilient and able to adapt to change
· Excellent written and verbal communication skills with ability to present technical details to a non-technical audience

Good to Have

·Experience with BMC Helix ITSM (Remedy) configuration and development
·Development experience in any of the following: REST-based integrations following industry standards- Angular (Angular 6/7/8+)

Education Requirements

· IT or Computer Science related Diploma / Degree

column1: Why does this job exist and why is it critical?

We are looking for a Key Account Manager to oversee the relationships of Maxis with its Small Medium Enterprise (SME) clients. You will be responsible for obtaining and maintaining long term key customers by comprehending their requirements.

The ideal candidate will be able in building strong relationships with strategic customers. You will be able to identify needs and requirements to promote our Maxis’ solutions and achieve mutual satisfaction.
The goal is to contribute in sustaining and growing our business to achieve long-term success.

• Develop trust relationships with a portfolio of major clients to ensure they do not turn to competition
  • Acquire a thorough understanding of key customer needs and requirements
  • Expand the relationships with existing customers by continuously proposing solutions that meet their objectives
  • Ensure the correct products and services are delivered to customers in a timely manner
  • Serve as the link of communication between key customers and internal teams
  • Resolve any issues and problems faced by customers and deal with complaints to maintain trust
  • Play an integral part in generating new sales that will turn into long-lasting relationships
  • Prepare regular reports of progress and forecasts to internal and external stakeholders using key account metrics
  • Present
column2:
promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
  • Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
  • Establish
column3:
develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
  • Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
  • Analyze the territory/market’s potential
column4:
track sales and status reports
  • Supply management with reports on customer needs
column8: and potential for new products and services

column1: What do you need to have for this role?

• Strong communication and interpersonal skills with aptitude in building relationships with professionals of all organizational levels
  • Result driven and passionate individual who eager to help customer by providing solutions based on customer needs
  • Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
  • Tertiary education in business administration

column1: “Coding competitions are for university students” - Wrong.

column2: and we are looking for veteran competitive programmers to help us. We have reinvented the software development process to break down product specs and milestones into individual code challenges with 4-8 hour SLAs

column1:
SUMMARY

The Transition Specialist is responsible for the co-ordination and completion of transition activities required to migrate (transition) new customers into Optus: migrate out of Optus or provide new services for existing customers. The main focus in these transitions is the smooth and on-time delivery to meet customers’ expectations and Optus business imperatives.

The Specialists manage or assist in managing Optus internal workgroups to deliver to customer or Optus transitioning schedules
column3:
services or a level of complexity requiring project-based coordination.

Specialists are required to participate in project meetings
column6:
document reviews and milestone achievement.

Transition Specialist are also implementation experts who may be required to consult on and support delivery of transition requirements in their area of expertise. In this capacity they act as internal consultants to key stakeholders to ensure that all requirements are planned and met.

column1:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

  • To contribute to the maintenance and control of transitions to enable early identification and communication of risks and emerging issues.
  • To contribute to high levels of customer service and resolving problems/issues with clients in a constructive manner.
  • Managing multiple projects and stakeholders requirements simultaneously
  • Assist projects across multiple workgroups to meet customer expectation . Lead and manage virtual teams and managing time commitment
  • Escalation of issues as appropriate to remuneration level
  • Project improvements to be implemented
  • Expected to lead in forming and executing recommendations that meet stakeholders requirements

REQUIREMENTS

Essential:

ITIL.V4 Foundation

Good to have:

Project Management Certification

CCNA Certification

1. Strong command of the English Language (Oral & Written)

2. Able to produce project documentation such as schedules and inventory to a quality standard

3. Strong Problem Solving Skills.

The Speedcast Group of companies are looking for a Corporate Income Tax Compliance Manager to manage the direct tax reporting obligations of the Group’s entities tax resident within the APAC region.

The role will report into the Group’s VP Taxes and will be the primary liaison responsible for managing the preparation and filing of all relevant Regional direct tax returns. This will include handling tax payments and where appropriate tax audits in conjunction with local advisors/accounting firms and the Speedcast Shared Service and Group Finance teams.

The role will also include working with the Group Finance in providing Regional tax accounting support at Group level (year end and quarterly reporting) and with Shared Services in meeting Local Statutory reporting needs.

Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.
Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.
Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.

column3: and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.

column1:
JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

CLIENT : ERICSSON MALAYSIA

TYPE : CONTRACT (12 MONTHS) RENEWABLE

SALARY : Market Rate

ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

  • Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

EXPERIENCE:

  • Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2:
Safety and Environmental.
  • Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
  • Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
  • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column3:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

column1:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
  • To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution
column3:
and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.
  • Required to standby for 24x7 duty roster
  • Produce require routine report.

column1:
BUSINESS & HUMAN COMPETENCE:

• Fluent in written and spoken English

• Verbal communication skills

• Relevant experience in MS-Office
column2:
reporting and presentation skill

• Be able to work independently with minimal supervision

• Able to work and co-operate in a team

• Able to work or support when needed

column3: Malaysia|Contract|Mid-Senior level|201-500 employees|Telecommunications|Field Service|"JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

column1: We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.
Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.
Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.

column3: and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.

• Fluent in written and spoken English

JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

CLIENT : ERICSSON MALAYSIA

TYPE : CONTRACT (12 MONTHS) RENEWABLE

SALARY : Market Rate

ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

  • Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

EXPERIENCE:

  • Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2:
Safety and Environmental.
  • Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
  • Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
  • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column3:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

column1:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
  • To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution
column3:
and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.

JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

CLIENT : ERICSSON MALAYSIA

TYPE : CONTRACT (12 MONTHS) RENEWABLE

SALARY : Market Rate

ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

  • Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

EXPERIENCE:

  • Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health

  • Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
  • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column3:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

column1:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
  • To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution

• Subject Matter Expert for Enterprise Service Management application

advising on if capabilities can be achieve via OOB ServiceNow functionalities or customizations are required

column3:
delivery and prioritization of change request

  • Perform configuration

custom development and 3rd party integrations based on user requirements
  • Perform unit testing and support SIT and UAT activities
column5:
mainly on defect troubleshooting and resolution
  • Prepare deployment packages

checklist and method of procedure
  • Carry-out and execute changes to production environment

building and configuring applications to meet business and application requirements

research skills and ability to review and analyze options for solutions

column1:
JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

CLIENT : ERICSSON MALAYSIA

TYPE : CONTRACT (12 MONTHS) RENEWABLE

SALARY : Market Rate

ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

  • Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

EXPERIENCE:

  • Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2:
Safety and Environmental.
  • Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
  • Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
  • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column3:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

column1:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
  • To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution
column3:
and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.
  • Required to standby for 24x7 duty roster
  • Produce require routine report.

• Verbal communication skills

• Relevant experience in MS-Office

To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.

To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.

DEPARTMENT: Field Services Operation

JOB TITLE: Field Services Operation – Field Engineer/Technician

REPORT TO: Line Manager

GENERAL:

Field Services Operations – Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.

· To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). IN ORDER TO improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.

  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution
column3:
and documentation sign-off IN ORDER TO meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.
  • Required to standby for 24x7 duty roster
  • Produce require routine report.

    • EXPERIENCE:

    • Years of experience: 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry
    • Qualification: Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field

    · Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management

    • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column4:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

TM NIOSH Safety Passport

column1: We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.
Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.
Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.

column3: and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.

column1:
JOB ROLE : FIELD SERVICES Operation

CLIENT : ERICSSON MALAYSIA

TYPE : CONTRACT (12 MONTHS) RENEWABLE

SALARY : Market Rate

ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

  • Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

EXPERIENCE:

  • Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2:
Safety and Environmental.
  • Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks
  • Minimum 2 year working experience in Field operation processes and tools management
  • Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column3:
Safety and Environmental
  • Certification: Working at height (WAH)

column1:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

  • To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.
  • To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.
  • To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.
  • To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and ensure all the WO meet SLA.
  • To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.
  • Accountable for day-to-day execution
column3:
and documentation sign-off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.
  • Required to standby for 24x7 duty roster
  • Produce require routine report.

column1:
BUSINESS & HUMAN COMPETENCE:

• Fluent in written and spoken English

• Verbal communication skills

• Relevant experience in MS-Office
column2:
reporting and presentation skill

• Be able to work independently with minimal supervision

• Able to work and co-operate in a team

• Able to work or support when needed

column1: Why does this job exist and why is it critical?

Support the HRBP as a strategic partner to the line/business by delivering HR solutions and programs that address line/ business requirements and which are in line with the company’s overall strategy. Responsible in facilitating and making the Maxis people promise a reality. Being a focal point in managing all people matters
column2: pushing for growth and talent management at the same time managing performance both high and low. Overall seen as a strong ally to the business to make commercial ambitions happen with the right

column1:
• Work with the HRBP on the strategic partners to the dedicated business units by delivering effective and the best HR solutions and programs to achieve shared organizational objectives and business requirements.
  • Enable the creation of business capabilities and help the accomplishment of the business strategy.
  • Consult with business leaders on organizational design and workforce planning for effective organizational changes to ensure alignment on future talent needs.
  • Drive talent development efforts within assigned business areas in the planning and implementation of leadership talent reviews
column3:
and development plans to ensure that the businesses have the right plans in place to develop current employees and future bench strength.
  • Drive employee engagement and retention plans for the businesses
column5: analysis and facilitation of plans to address surveys
column6:
turnover and workforce issues.
  • Manage employee relations activities which include employee counseling/coaching
column8:
track feedback and trends while providing feedback to business leaders on emerging trends or patterns within the business groups.
  • Lead and manage manpower planning and resulting staff related cost to enable the company to achieve its Annual Operating Plan (AOP) targets.
  • Drive and manage the performance management and compensation cycles for the assigned businesses
column9: with guidance from Center of Excellence to achieve direct financial gain
column10:
motivated workforce and improve management control.
  • Provide coaching and guidance to management on issue resolution
column13:
including performance management and general HR policies & procedures.
  • Analyzing trends and metrics on people related agenda

column1: What do you need to have for this role?

• A degree in any field however experience working in HR related roles and other projects actively revolving around people would be an advantage.
  • Possess strong business acumen with ability to build organization effectiveness through HR solutions and best practices
  • Ability to effectively engage at all levels of employees with good stakeholder management
  • Analytical and goal oriented with a drive to see initiatives followed through and brought to fruition
  • Demonstrable experience with HR Metrics and measurements
  • Thoroughly enjoy working with people and seeing business results achieved by getting the people strategy right
  • Good command of English
column2:
both written and oral
  • Intermediate knowledge of Microsoft Office
column3: especially Microsoft Excel and Employment Act 1955 would be preferred

column1: We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.
Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.
Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2: Safety and Environmental. Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks

column1:
ROLE PURPOSE:

We are looking for highly motivated and passionate Field Services Operation that could handle on-site services and repairs for company equipment. Field Engineer/Technician job role is to perform operation and maintenance (O&M) support for corrective and preventive maintenance and as a bridge between Field Service Operation and Project Roll out to fulfil both side requirement without impacting network performance & jeopardies Project implementation schedule.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE

• QUALIFICATION / EXPERIENCE:

Diploma/Degree in Telecommunication Engineering/Computer or any other relevant field. Certification Working at height (WAH) or CIDB or TM NIOSH Safety Passport. Fluent in written and spoken English.

• EXPERIENCE:

Experienced 2-5 years in Telecommunications industry. Relevant knowledge in Field operation Health
column2:
Safety and Environmental. Equipped with some level of knowledge in LTE/5G networks

PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILTIES

• To perform 1st Level field troubleshooting (corrective maintenance) on access layer LTE/5G network elements and services.

• To ensure fault restoration is within the SLA.

• To perform preventive maintenance (by schedule frequency). In order to improve the

network stability such as intermittent and repeated faults.

• To execute and handle assigned WFM-IFS WO within a certain time frame and

ensure all the WO meet SLA.

• To ensure Apparatus Assignment (AA) are in place.

• Accountable for day-to-day execution
column4:
and documentation sign-

off in order to meet rollout implementation quality and fulfil customer demand.

• Required to standby for 24x7 duty roster

• Produce require routine report.
